title: Welcome to My BYOM JSON→HTML Demo
subtitle: This page is generated using Adobe’s json2html overlay
paragraphs: This page demonstrates how Edge Delivery Services transforms JSON data into HTML markup automatically.
The json2html overlay reads this JSON and constructs a semantic HTML document with heading, paragraph and image tags.
You can replace or extend this JSON with your own structured content (e.g., product data, event details, blog posts).

cta.text: Learn more about Bring Your Own Markup (BYOM)
